Html:
Hi kobush,

Just wondering if there were any news on the project.

Regards,

Hi,
Sorry for this big delay. It seems I still haven't recovered after holiday.

However I have managed to invite Codeable who already helped me with this project.

You got me thinking with your ideas but I still haven't decided how to approach this. I would like to create a wiki page with proposed project structure so we can first decide on this and then restructure the code. I hope to find time to work on this today evening.

Szymon.
